thread.section_title: SA Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SA Expeditions | saexpeditions.com
thread.title: Natalie

author: Natalie
title: Natalie
text: We used SA Expeditions to plan a trip to Peru (Amazon and then Cusco/Sacred Valley/Machu Picchu). It was amazing! From start to finish, Arina made sure every detail was taken care of. She even helped find us a beautiful spa in Lima when we had an 8 hour layover and said that we wanted to use the time for some self-pampering before going home. Our guides, accommodations, everything were wonderful, and we didn't have to do anything to plan. Would recommend this to anyone.
